JOB DESCRIPTION:
Experience: 2+ Years,  (Post: 1) 

Software Developer (Backend) Ahmedabad,  IN 

Apply for position 

Nextbits Web Solutions is recruiting Magento developers to join our small and fast- growing development team. We are looking for dynamic individuals who want to be part of a successful young team with an enviable track record in e- commerce. The successful applicants will have the opportunity to make a significant contribution to our continued growth,  and to influence the future direction of our e- commerce platforms. Candidate must be proficient with Magento. Should be able to work on high- functioning e- commerce websites with customized modules. 

Education: Bachelor degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering or Computer Information Systems or Software Engineering.
